name: Traffic Crash - Highway Racer
description:
Plunge into vehicles in highway traffic while escaping from police helicopter.

Racing against reckless drivers in hot sport cars has never been that much fun! Choose your car, crash into traffic, escape from helicopters and race against the time while drifting. Score as much as possible by driving other cars out of the road and giving them the bitter taste of the asphalt. Increase your score even more by collecting coins and staying on the road as long as you can.

Choose one of the 3 game modes and start racing on the highway: score as much as possible against limited time on Crash mode, against limited health on Long Run mode and against a helicopter firing at you on Hot Pursuit mode.

Key features:
- 14 cars to choose from
- 3 different game modes: Crash, Long Run and Hot Pursuit
- 3 different camera angles
- High speed arcade racing with intuitive touch and tilt controls
- Varying environments: from forests to hills, highways and cities
- Gorgeous 3D visuals, even on low-end devices
- Integration with Google Play Services

WIDE SELECTION OF CARS
Select one of the 14 cars and start burning tires on the race track: from pick-up truck to fastest car on earth, this game has them all!

3 DIFFERENT GAME MODES
In Crash mode, crash into cars in a limited time. Drive as long as you can in Long Run mode. Evade that helicopter and race through the traffic in Hot Pursuit mode.

3 DIFFERENT CAMERA ANGLES
Real racing experience with 3 different camera angles. Drive your car from the most immersive angle you can imagine.

ARCADE STYLE DRIVING
Easiest driving style on the market! Do not worry about making that turn, your car will drift on the asphalt for you. Only focus on driving and crashing into traffic.

EVOLVING ENVIRONMENTS
Drive your car through different environments: race on highways, burn asphalts, drift corners, climb hills, drive under bridges and crash onto buildings.

HIGHLY OPTIMIZED STUNNING GRAPHICS
You have a low end device but still want to satisfy your need for speed with beautiful visuals? Search no more, because Traffic Crash is here.

INTEGRATION WITH GOOGLE PLAY SERVICES
Login automatically with your own account, complete achievements and post your scores to leaderboards to compete against the world!
